analytical: Solve puzzles, practice coding, analyze case studies.
creative: Try design challenges, drawing, brainstorming exercises.
social: Join clubs, participate in group discussions.
leadership: Lead small projects or organize events.
practical: Build DIY projects or hands-on experiments.
risk: Take calculated challenges or entrepreneurship tasks.
focus: Use Pomodoro technique or deep-work sessions.
curiosity: Explore new topics and ask questions regularly.
